Reviews.Title: Cute TV....
Reviews.Author: Mersada Cobovic
Reviews.Content: I like it.  It doesn't get the reception I was hoping for, but I guess I have to get a stronger antenna.  It is a cute set, though. I am looking forward to using the dvd feature soon.  I think it's awesome that it has the dvd feature on such a small set.  It will be awesome to use to do exercise videos with it.

Reviews.Title: Amazon perfect 10, GizmGrab 0!
Reviews.Author: Cassandra
Reviews.Content: So I originally ordered this tv for my young daughter because it was perfect size and a combo deal with the built in DVD player. No problems with Amazon itself, however the original seller of this device,GIZMOGRAB screwed it up. Not only did i pay for the faster delivery and was given the expectations of 2 day shipping but instead needed to be refunded because I didnt receive it for 2 weeks almost(Mind you, I ordered it at the beginning of the week,so two business day would have brought me to thurs-fri) but they then sent me the wrong tv! I l've amazon, but I'm NEVER ordering from GIZMOGRAB AGAIN

ProductInfo.Features:
TV Type: LED/DVD
Screen Size Class: 19"
Vertical Resolution: 720p
Maximum Resolution: 1366 x 768
Screen Refresh Rate: 60Hz
ProductInfo.Name: Ematic 19" LED 720p 60Hz HDTV/DVD | ETD209
